name: Hobb Rindle
description: A small, wiry Halfling with a face like a dried apple and quick, darting eyes. He wears multiple layers of light, tattered linen and leather, reinforced with small plates of frequency-glass at the joints. He carries a collection of small, humming obsidian-anchors used for marking tremors. He moves with a nervous, jerky energy, constantly twitching his ears toward the mountain's floor. He holds a short, arcanotech signal-rod.
bio: Hobb was a professional scavenger in the outer wastes before the Scourge-invasion. He has an uncanny ability to find hidden caches of supplies and is an expert at navigating the treacherous tunnels. He is fiercely independent and distrustful of authority, but he has a soft spot for the children of the refugee camps.
motivation: Finding enough 'Spark-Scraps' to ensure his own survival and the survival of those he cares about.
